Author: paranoidandpanicked
Text: If you have a friend with body issues or an Ed, you guys should make a habit of regularly complimenting eachother. Me and a friend of mine both have a history of Ed and self harm in general so we just shower eachother with compliments.  If that’s not an option, just force yourself to say something nice about yourself I know it probably sounds like bullshit but honestly fake it till you make it really works sometimes.  And also I can guarantee that there are people out there that look at you and think you’re beautiful.
